title: BecksBeer.com help?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011133652im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/becksbeer_3414.jpg)

Does anyone know what font Beck’s uses at the top of their BecksBeer.com webpage? It says Different By Choice, and the fonts I was given for my project don’t match what they’re using on their website. I can probably get this information tomorrow directly from them, but I lose a day (somewhat).

Thanks!

 [‹ Jack Planck FONT ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011133652/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44815 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please ID this ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011133652/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44824 "Go to next forum topic")
author: visualingo

comments.content: Infinity-C-B for anyone keeping tabs. Yahoo! Answers for the win!
